name: SDO_DAS_XML.loadFile
purpose: Returns SDO_DAS_XML_Document object for a given path to xml instance document

return.description:
Returns SDO_DAS_XML_Document object on Success or throws 
   exception as described.

errors:
SDO_TypeNotFoundException
     
     
      
       Thrown if a type is not defined by the underlying model.SDO_PropertyNotFoundException
     
     
      
       Thrown if a property within a type is not defined 
       in the underlying model.SDO_DAS_XML_ParserException
     
     
      
       Thrown for any problems while parsing the given XSD File.SDO_DAS_XML_FileException
     
     
      
       Thrown if the specified file cannot be found.
